data.name: SODJ — Okanime.com
data.description: Remove nonsense from Okanime.com and make it more user friendly

data.name: another dark toribash theme
data.description: It's a dark theme for the Toribash forums. I tried to get as many things included as possible, but alas, a few borders may have eluded me. :v Inspired very much by TB DARK by SurgeTB, though i did end up writing all of this from scratch. It should be noted that this is ONLY for the legacy layout of the forums! The modern layout is already nice and dark and i see no reason to change it, i mostly keep this theme around because i'm too used to the old layout to switch.

data.name: Flat_SteamCN_V1
data.description: Flat_SteamCN V1 for Chrome & Firefox 改动SteamCN论坛样式，优化一下视觉。 版本ver1.2 [2016/12/09] /--------------已无需安装以下脚本-------------------/ 配合该脚本修改高级编辑器背景for SteamCN修复高级编辑器 可以去帖子提交反馈/下方提交

data.name: chess.com olive board
data.description: Make chess.com board background like lichess.org's olive board background.
data.css:
@-moz-document domain("chess.com"){
div[class^="daily-puzzle-board"],
div[class^="board chessboard-container-chessboard"],
div[class^="game-preview"],
div[id$="_ChessBoard_boardarea"],
div[id^="chess_com_openingboard_1"],
div[id^="board_training"],
div[id^="divBoard_boardarea"],
div[id^="chess_com_tactics_board"],
div[id^="chessboard_"],
div[id*="chessboard_"],
div[class^="board rounded"],
div[class^="board disabled rounded"],
div[class^="board disabled"],
div[class^="board flipped rounded"],
div[class^="board chessboard-component disabled"],
div[class^="board chessboard-component"],
div[id^="chess_com_chessmentorboard_"],
div[id*="chess_com_chessmentorboard_"],
div[id*="chess_com_chessmentor_board_1_boardarea"],
div[id^="chess_com_emailboard_"],
div[id*="chess_com_emailboard_"],
div[class*="board v-board rounded"],
div[class*="board v-board flipped rounded"],
div[class*="board v-board chessboard-component"]

{
background-image: url("https://lichess1.org/assets/images/board/olive.jpg")!important;
border-radius: 0px !important;
}
}
